dict.string:
Disables the passcode screen from showing when you press the home button on the lockscreen.
Useful if you have a finicky home button or are just annoyed by this native feature.
TIP: As a backup way to get to the passcode screen, setup an Activator event on the lockscreen (i.e. swipe on bottom of the screen from left to right etc.) to "Unlock Device".
[v.1] Tested with an iPad mini 4 on 10.2. Made as a request via r/jailbreak. (7-19-17)
